database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS- Interkingdom Microbial Interactions from Bayley Hazen Blue Cheese
entry.description: Interkingdom interactions between JB182 and Penicillium spp. Information about the strain isolation can be found in the following article: Title: Cheese Rind Communities provide tractable systems for in situ and in vitro studies of microbial diversity Authors: BE Wolfe, JE Button, M Santarelli, RJ Dutton Cell, 2014, article accpeted.
